about_the_game:
MEs is a new personal knowledge collection and network of multiplayer worlds — a multiplayer file system that visualizes your images, music, text, and 3D models as virtual worlds. Use them as materials to build your own worlds to play and share the visualization of your thinking.

STORY
Explore the endless world of MEs and encounter art, data, memories, and unexpected "artifacts." Exchange hearts and minds with others on your journey of encountering and re-exploring your own mental map. Play with the natural flow of your deep thoughts in ever-expanding constellations, while enhancing communications, growing relationships and building community.

DEVELOPER NOTES
MEs is still in very early stages of development, so we appreciate any and all forms of feedback! If you are interested in helping us test MEs, please follow the Discord link or sign up on our website from the information panel to right.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires an Apple processor
  • OS: macOS 12.0 or newer
  • Graphics: Metal-capable GPU
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

name: MEs

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 8 GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit version
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 16 GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: Take part in exploring the ever-expanding innerworlds of MEs — a personal knowledge collection for gathering the smallest sparks of ideas.
